org.apache.oozie.event.listener

Class JobEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oozie.event.listener.JobEventListener
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JMSJobEventListener, SLAJobEventListener

    public abstract class JobEventListener
extends Object
    Event listener for Job notification events, defining methods corresponding to job status changes
